Plot: A pre-operative male-to-female transsexual takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.
Title: Transamerica
Actors: Andrea James, Felicity Huffman, Danny Burstein, Maurice Orozco
tomatoConsensus: A terrific performance by Felicity Huffman carries this unconventional but touching transgender road movie.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 31 wins & 21 nominations.
